name: Super Pokemon Bros
description:
All copyright belong to Nintendo and Gamefreak. This is only a non-profit fanmade crossover between both franchise for the Secret Santa Game Jam. 

In this game we will have to catch different pokemons in order to solve the different Mario-style platforms and then fight with a very unique final boss. We control up to these 4 iconic Pokemon along the whole game. Controls are in the game:

  • AD, Arrow Keys: Movement.
  • W, Up Arrow: Jump (x2).
  • S, Down Arrow: Enter Pipe.
    • [Arrow keys are recommended for a more smooth control]
  • E: Dash.
  • Q: Change Pokemon.
  • F: Throw Pokeball.
  • Space: Shoot.

Spritesheet base for Pokemons: https://www.spriters-resource.com/submitter/JoshR691/

Art: Nestor "Nestyboy99" Schulten

Design & Programming: Raúl López Martín

Programming: Josioque

Art & Design: Christian Villanueva

Sound effects and Art: Abraham "Pirty"

Sounds effects: Guillermo Tizón López

Music: Route 1 Pokemon Blue, Nintendo Co.
